title: Defining a New Category: Why CX Observability Matters in Today’s AI-Powered Contact Centers
summary: As AI agents become more prevalent in contact centers and technology becomes more fragmented, a new category, CX Observability, is emerging to address the resulting blind spots. This category is particularly relevant in today's AI-powered contact centers. The article discusses the importance of CX Observability in ensuring efficient and effective customer service.
hook: New category, CX Observability, emerges in AI-powered contact centers.

title: ServiceNow and OpenAI Push AI Past Chatbots into Real CX Work
summary: ServiceNow and OpenAI have partnered to push AI beyond chatbots and into real customer experience (CX) work. The focus is on addressing the gap between customer requests and actual resolution, moving past legacy automation and speech agents. The partnership aims to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of customer service operations.
hook: ServiceNow, OpenAI partnership pushes AI beyond chatbots into real CX work.

title: The $50 Billion Question: How Do You Charge for an AI Agent Seat That Doesn’t Exist?
summary: Autonomous AI agents are handling 30-40% of work previously done by humans in the CX space, causing a shift in pricing models. CFOs are demanding discounts as CX platforms still price as if every unit of value is a human. This is leading to a redesign of contracts and vendors absorbing compute volatility.
hook: AI agents revolutionizing CX space, forcing contract and pricing model overhaul.

title: Customer service and contact center
summary: The article discusses the impact of AI on enterprise workflows, particularly in customer service. It also mentions the rise of remote work leading to innovations in field service management and changes in customer experience. However, it does not provide specific details on CCaaS or related technologies.
hook: AI is reshaping customer service and remote work innovations.

title: E-Commerce
summary: The article discusses the use of AI in accelerating enterprise workflows, particularly in e-commerce and customer service. It also mentions the importance of visual search strategies for improving online product visibility and customer engagement. Salesforce has updated its Agentforce Commerce with AI tools for personalization.
hook: AI accelerates workflows, Salesforce updates Agentforce with AI personalization tools.

title: Features
summary: The article discusses the shift in AI decisions from capability to ownership, control, and accountability in planning for the year ahead. It also explores the potential of agentic commerce, like ChatGPT shopping, in streamlining B2B product procurement, while highlighting the need for enterprise infrastructure, security, and purchasing validation processes. It mentions two early adopters of Salesforce's agentic AI that have adapted it to customer service business needs.
hook: AI decisions shift focus; agentic commerce potential in B2B procurement explored.

title: Tips
summary: The article discusses the impact of remote work on field service management and how it has led to new product features. It also provides tips for e-commerce professionals and CX leaders on improving online product visibility and customer engagement. Lastly, it highlights key CX trends that business tech buyers should pay attention to.
hook: Remote work reshaping field service management and CX trends.

title: Webinars, videos and virtual events
summary: TechTarget's BrightTALK.com platform offers over 100,000 webinars, videos, and virtual events on various tech and business topics, including Customer Experience (CX). The content focuses on the evolving technology landscape in industries like retail, and its impact on customer interactions. Specific topics or companies related to Contact Center as a Service (CCaaS) are not mentioned.
hook: Explore CX trends with TechTarget's massive webinar and video library!

title: Trends and Innovation
summary: The article is a sponsored content by IT vendors, focusing on how ServiceNow CSM and IT solutions can enhance customer service experience and operational resilience. It does not provide any specific insights or trends related to the Contact Center as a Service (CCaaS) or Customer Experience (CX) space. The content is more of a promotional nature rather than analytical or informative.
hook: Explore how ServiceNow aims to boost customer service and operational resilience.

title: Ask the Experts
summary: The article discusses the importance of customer retention and loyalty in businesses, how they differ and work together. It also highlights the benefits of loyalty programs, including retaining valuable customers, gathering marketing data, and increasing referrals. The piece also mentions the confusion in sales and marketing terms.
hook: Understanding customer retention vs loyalty for better CX strategies.

title: Essential Guides
summary: TechTarget has curated a collection of articles focusing on key IT topics, including customer experience management (CEM), AI, machine learning, NLP, advanced analytics, cloud-based tools and workforce management software. The guides aim to provide comprehensive, problem-solving content to inform and guide research. The growth of CEM and the technologies being applied to it are highlighted.
hook: Explore TechTarget's curated guides on key IT and CX topics!

title: Customer Experience Definitions
summary: The article discusses the concept of a 360-degree customer view, which compiles individual customer data from various touchpoints into a single view. It also introduces the Account-based experience (ABX) strategy, a B2B approach where sales, marketing, and customer success departments collaborate to provide a unified, personalized experience throughout the buyer journey. Additionally, it emphasizes the importance of actionable insights derived from data.
hook: Unpacking 360-degree customer view and ABX strategy for enhanced CX.

title: Opinion
summary: The article discusses the impact of AI on sales, the public perception of Marc Benioff, and the performance of Nike and Adidas in the NFT world. There is no direct relevance to the Contact Center / CCaaS / CX space.
hook: AI impact on sales and NFT trends in sportswear industry.

title: Podcasts
summary: The 'Pipeline' podcast features discussions on the complexities of customer experience (CX) and the challenges of migrating legacy on-premises contact center platforms to the cloud. CX expert Scott Sachs and U.K. author Adrian Swinscoe provide insights on these topics. Additionally, Marketo VP Matt Zilli discusses the future of the marketing automation platform, particularly for Salesforce CRM users.
hook: Insights on CX complexities and migrating contact centers to the cloud.

title: Quizzes
summary: The article discusses how AI technology is shaping the content management market, including the ability for users to tag documents with plain-language instructions. It also mentions the importance of evaluating content collaboration platforms for businesses. However, it does not specifically relate to the Contact Center / CCaaS / CX space.
hook: AI reshaping content management, but lacks CCaaS relevance.

title: Tech Accelerators
summary: TechTarget's Tech Accelerator packages aim to help enterprise leaders understand the importance of IT technologies in their companies' success. The packages cover a range of technologies and include features, news, technical tips and infographics. The content explains what the technology or service is, how to buy it, manage it and troubleshoot problems.
hook: TechTarget's Tech Accelerator: Simplifying IT technologies for enterprise leaders!

title: Tutorials
summary: The article discusses the use of AI technology in content management, including tagging and generative AI. It also touches on the evaluation of content collaboration platforms. There is no direct reference to the Contact Center / CCaaS / CX space.

title: Videos
summary: The article discusses how AI technology is shaping the content management market, with a focus on tagging and organizing documents. It also touches on the importance of choosing the right content collaboration platforms for businesses. However, it does not specifically mention or relate to the Contact Center / CCaaS / CX space.
